What size system will you need?



How would you like to save some money?
Hire us to provide the sound for your event and there is no delivery charge for the first 150 round trip miles!

Small

276 Amp Hour battery, 1,100 watts sine wave inverter.
$50.00 per hour in 30 minute increments, with a four hour minimum.

Delivery to your site is billed at $1.25 per mile round trip from Melrose, MA, 02176.
This includes set up and an on site technician and assistant for the duration of your event.

Medium

552 Amp Hour battery, 1,000 watt sine wave, 1,250 watt pulse wave inverters.
$70.00 per hour in 30 minute increments, with a four hour minimum.

Delivery to your site is billed at $2.50 per mile round trip from Melrose, MA, 02176.
This includes set up and an on site technician and assistant for the duration of your event.

Large

1,050 Amp Hour battery, 2,000 watt sine wave, 2,000 watt pulse wave inverters.
$90.00 per hour in 30 minute increments with a four hour minimum.

Delivery to your site is billed at $2.50 per mile round trip from Melrose, MA, 02176.
This includes set up and an on site technician and assistant for the duration of your event.

Discounts available when hiring multiple systems ... Please request a quote.
